Kilimanjaro, Tanzania 2013

Got back to the gate at 10:30. First group of season to have returned by this route. Sat down for lunch at Mweka and was mobbed by guys trying to sell tat.

Hopped into our bus for ride back to lodge, dropping off all our porters along the way. Had dinner, mooched about.
